sourcesContent:
Search Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure?.place}}
{{flight.departure?.time | date}}
{{flight.departure?.time | date:'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival?.place}}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date}}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date:'shortTime'}}

Status: ", err.status) // console.log("Response Error. Status Text: ", err.statusText) // console.log(err) // } //} import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FlightService } from './../api/services/flight.service'; import { FlightRm } from '../api/models'; // Update import to include FlightRm @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchResult: FlightRm[] = []; constructor(private flightService: FlightService) { } search() { const searchParams = {}; // Replace with your actual search parameters this.flightService.searchFlight(searchParams) .subscribe( (response: FlightRm[]) => { this.searchResult = response; }, (error) => { this.handleError(error); } ); } private handleError(err: any) { console.error('Response Error. Status:', err.status); console.error('Response Error. Status Text:', err.statusText); console.error(err); } }
